channel.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
channel.description: Just an idea i thought of. During the beginning of the Resosnece Cascade in the Anti mass spectrometer chamber, before you get knocked out cold, when all the sprites are gathering at the crystal sample, you see a glimpse of the G-Mans face in front of you, but transparent like in the beginning of HL2. So thoughts, comments, flaming, go ahead.

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Atomic_Waffle
item.description:
The G-Man was supposed to appear rarely and not all the time, and certainly not very clearly during the resonance cascade. An additional appearance before the test chamber -might- be appropriate, but at that point in the game it really doesn’t seem necessary at all. The whole idea of the G-Man in HL1 is that he would appear in completely unreachable places where the player doesn’t expect it. He doesn’t start fucking with the laws of physics and entering your mind until much later on.

G-Man appearances need to be done rarely, but effectively.

Read full topic

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
Back on topic.

Feeling that this thread is getting a little old I just want to say… keep it simple stupid. I feel that this part of the mod needs no change at all and that the original was already good enough, so good that the devs will make it even better then before.

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Sky Monster:

It seems Eric is trying to replicate that douchefaggotry way of shooting down any suggestion because it’s “NOT EXACTLY LIEK OLD HL ZOMFG n00bz!11!1”

Fight it Eric, you can win!!

On topic: I like the idea of falling panels and portal storms.

P.S. OP spelled Resonance incorrectly.

That just my point, not “OMG BMS GLOVE IS NOT LIEK HL1 GLAVE!!! CHANGE IT!!!”

Read full topic

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Rosie:

although it sounds cool, i dont like the idea. going thru the game and being like wtf who is this guy and what the hell is he doing here all nice and calm yet never offering me help/conversation/cup of tea, until the end when your like oh… no wonder he was all stalker like. i think his face popping up would provide too much of a connection with him and the ‘accident’

You gotta point.It’b be cool if it flashes for like, 1 frame that you can very easily miss…

Floyd:

HL is a far longer game that HL2, and yet I swear HL2 had far more G-Man appearances.

HL2 did have more, HL had 1 each in about 8 chapters( i may have missed 1 or 2, i counted by memory) whereas HL2 had 2 or even 3 in a about half the chapters( but i could be way off as I personnly prefer to play HL1 over HL2 so i’m not entirely familiar with G-man sighting in HL2 :facepalm: )

Read full topic

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
the resonance cascade should distort space like in some games i’ve seen, kind of like refraction in a bubble - i think Metroid Prime did it when you charge up the lazer. Portal does it really subtly when you shoot a surface that is impervious to portals. I mean thats pretty much what the resonance cascade does, distort/tear space, really its a no-brainer.

Read full topic

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects

I retract my statement; I thought I had read something about it in the FAQ.

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
^ You can’t know that. As far as I can remember, the devs have said virtually nothing about the G-Man and his appearances. There were several suggestions before the crash about updating the G-Man’s appearances to take advantage of different media such as CCTV cameras or televisions a la HL2, which were received very well by the community from what I can remember.

Since these technologies weren’t available to HL when it was made, there’s no reason to think that they wouldn’t encoporate them and make variations of existing appearances, or even to make new ones.

HL is a far longer game that HL2, and yet I swear HL2 had far more G-Man appearances.

Read full topic

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
Kavukamari:

well if we’re talking about gman appearances, you gotta put the happy gman from garrysmod flying around somewhere during the cascade…

Not really though.

Gman should be standing in the room where the two scientists talk for like 5 minutes before letting you into the test chamber (meaning you’ll see him if you go over there and look through the glass) he straightens his tie, brushes off his suit, and walks towards the back of the room, at which point you teleport away

(He would like… walk into view right when you kick the sample into the beam and his animations would be timed so that he finishes before you teleport… at least that’s how I see it)

They won’t add (afaik) any gman appearances

Read full topic

item.title: Resonance Cascade Effects
item.dc:creator: Skaevola
item.description:
1: Don’t be bitin’ BlackOps’ style. We still await his return, when the End is Nigh and BM is released…

2:The Portal Storm effect really wouldn’t be out of place, but it was pretty low-quality even in Half Life 2 and the devs have shown that their standards are quite a bit higher than Valve’s. That said, I have a feeling that the RC has long been finished, and it will certainly blow our freaking minds.

3: Don’t worry, Lollipop, we know you’re the shining exception to the “no retards” rule

Read full topic
